Record Collection/WB (2004) Released: 23 Nov 2004 7 tracks (38:11) 
A Sphere in the Heart of Silence is the fifth album in a series of six solo efforts that John Frusciante undertook from June 2004 to February 2005. It is an album of mostly electronica based material, and was a joint collaboration between John Frusciante and friend Josh Klinghoffer.
